course_title: Selected Topics in Music - MUSC THRY PEDGOG

sections.comments: Topic: Music Theory Pedagogy. With MUSC 533U.  An overview of pedagogical philosophies and techniques for teaching music theory at the university level. Students will reinforce theory concepts, develop teaching and course design skills, and gain familiarity with current textbooks, materials, and issues in music theory instruction.

description: See School of Music schedule for description and prerequisites. Restricted to B. Mus. and B.A. in Music students.
